data.message: Awesome!!! This story brought Me to tears!!

replies.message: Same with us, Kim! Thanks for sharing your positive feedback. -Elizabeth
Me too....
Me to Kim.
Beautiful People! Boca MM
While reading this post, I felt my heart warming and a smile come to my face. Thank you for sharing such humanity.

What a wonderful story. As I was growing up, my mother taught me to be just as pleasant to the persons cleaning the halls as I was to other white collar employees in the building I worked with. Sometimes I ate lunch with them. I saw them as equals with just different job descriptions.
Me, too.
Seeing success through hard work and desire is beautiful

I have quite an amazing story to tell, a WOW GOD story!! It’s a long one and hoping to write it someday!?! Long story short, I was saved by the Grace of God and the Power of Prayer!! A walking, talking miracle!!!
There are still good people in the world. So proud of you guys.
S
There are still good people in the world.so proud you guys.

Lucy Davis   Way to go girl!!  I was taught that that grimy, downtrodden , maybe smelly person sitting or standing near you could be Jesus Christ testing your resolve.   Why can't people understand this with the rise in hate crimes, violence, indifference and, oh yeah, bullying (which is a new label that many of us & immigrants from years ago as well as right now, right here in our "Apple pie & ice cream neighborhoods" experience?? We ALL have the same 
Creator, so doesn't that mean we all should obey his laws, & at the very least BE KIND??
Me 2 kim
Totally agree!! More people like him needed so muchGOD BLESS YOU!!!

Maybe it was someone doing good, why does religion have to be discussed I don't push my non belief on others it would be refreshing it religious people could be. Is Lucy Davis over 15? If so she's a woman
Oh yes Lucy Davis is over 15
I'm a custodian at a major University an it's nice to see that someone out there appreciates the work we do, thank you

Perfect. Joe, your comments have merit. We're all created by a supreme being; & this is  &  (will  be my personal belief) however it does nothing to reach & teach the human race to embrace what is love, what is true, what is within every human nature to love, protect, nurture each one of us on this earth unless we as humans display &Very sadly many who fall under "Their judgmental, sad umbrellas i the name of ANY religion" do so much to create separation, ignorance & that it's sooo sad & devastating to the thought process of the human raceWE ALL need to be in deep tought about how to change the human race, our earth & in my opinion,lovin sometimes people we don't personally believe our love, not be judgmental or bully. In place, we can make every attempt to understand (all people have issues & are usually worse than out own. Be kind... maybe be the first to show love, kindness & that an individual has self worth, & always attempt showing that person is worthy & worth. 

Even small liked of kindness & helpfulness & just listening can be miraculous to them & to you!!!

This is very doable...many will help & some may start & some will mot!!
 It's a beginning!!💕🤗🌅
